title: S4 support looking to improve
body: I am a s4 support I practice map awareness and counterparts etc  and main janna leona and soraka with knowledge of other champs. I always find my self winning my lane unless the adc really is just awful. I'm looking for anyone or group that would allow me to join them to learn, have fun , and kick some butt in the process.

replies.body: Hey if you're interested in improving I am a Gold 2 support main but can easily adc for you. Add me in game and when we're on and we get the chance we can try a few norms with discord or curse. Ill adc you support and i'll generally tell you what you're doing well and what you can improve on. I'll try to explain why and what you should be doing in particular situations. IGN: Loony Russian
Am a plat support main so lemme know if you want me to spectate your games.
This is that exact type of help I was hoping to get. Sorry for the late reply I'll add you in game as soon as I log in. I can't wait for the opportunity.

S5 Mid LF people to play w/. Have discord! 

ERROR 1404
